title: Former GOP Sen. Alan Simpson dies in Wyoming
shortDescription: A proud advocate for conservative causes, former senator Alan Simpson had a strong libertarian streak that supported abortion rights and gay equality.

title: Could Trump’s tariffs spur a recession?
shortDescription: An economist warns consumers about a potential economic downturn with President Donald Trump's trade war pressing on.

title: Schumer to vote for funding bill, reducing shutdown odds | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: A Reuters/Ipsos poll finds most Americans believe President Donald Trump is being too “erratic” on the economy. It's all on The Excerpt.

title: 'Guts': Trump praises Dem leader Schumer over shutdown vote: Live
shortDescription: President Trump spent the week unleashing wide-ranging tariff threats against America's trading partners.

title: Trump administration outlines demands to restore Columbia funding
shortDescription: The Ivy League university has faced intense scrutiny from the Trump administration over its handling of pro-Palestinian student protests in 2024.

title: Sen. Chuck Schumer to vote for funding bill
shortDescription: Democratic Senator Chuck Schumer says he will vote for the GOP funding bill to avoid a government shutdown.

title: Chuck Schumer says he'll vote for Republican funding bill
shortDescription: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer, D-N.Y., said he will vote for the GOP funding extension, which must pass Friday to avoid a shutdown.

title: What type of cancer did Rep. Raul Grijalva have? Congressman dies at 77
shortDescription: Longtime Rep. Raul Grijalva, D-Ariz. passed away at 77 on Thursday after a battle with lung cancer.

title: Trump to invoke 'Alien' act from 1798 to expedite deportations
shortDescription: Experts predict a swift legal challenge to Trump's 'novel' approach of invoking wartime powers to target immigration.

title: Trump asks Supreme Court to let birthright citizenship order proceed
shortDescription: Trump has said he thinks the Supreme Court will let him restrict birthright citizenship to bolster security along the southern border.

title: 'Staggering': Trump drove European defense spending, NATO chief says
shortDescription: Trump has repeatedly expressed his contention that European countries have been taking advantage of the U.S. by not spending more on defense.

title: Government shutdown blame game: Why Senate Democrats are in a pickle
shortDescription: There's already a Congressional blame game happening with less than two days until a government shutdown.

title: Protesters supporting Mahmoud Khalil arrested at Trump Tower; Columbia punishes students
shortDescription: New York City police arrested 98 people during protests against the detainment of Columbia University graduate student Mahmoud Khalil, 30.

title: In new Trump era, South Korea weighs building its own nuclear weapons
shortDescription: South Korea's foreign minister told the country's legislature Wednesday that developing nuclear weapons is not off the table

title: Trump calls for death penalty for migrants who kill Americans
shortDescription: Donald Trump vows to invoke the Alien Enemies Act while calling for the death penalty for migrants who kill Americans.

title: Some migrants deported from US under Trump have already returned
shortDescription: 'People think deportation is the end of the story...It isn’t the end of anything,' said Austin Kocher, of Syracuse University.

title: Judge orders Trump to reinstate tens of thousands of fired workers
shortDescription: The ruling applies to workers who were fired from six agencies during recent purge of government workers.

title: Trump threatens 200% tariff on alcohol from EU
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has threatened to place a 200% tariff on all alcohol from the European Union.
